DOC.brief_summary: Investigating the effect of prazosin for nighttime symptoms of civilian Posttraumatic Stress Disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study: The Effect of Prazosin for Nighttime Symptoms of Civilian PTSD
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject will receive prazosin and placebo trials, the order randomized. Day and nighttime symptoms will be monitored.
DOC.criteria: must meet DSMIV criterion for PTSD Must not have untreated sleep apnea
